name: Under the Sky World~Another~
description:
★Please note that this game has no gameplay, It's an extra story! ★

Under the Sky World ~Another~" is a short gaiden story of "Under the Sky World" developed by Circle Fairy Flower and published by BokiBokiGames!
This work can be run independently, do not need to install the "Under the Sky World" the main game.
It is recommended to play "Under the Sky World" first, and then experience the story, will have a better game experience!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2185760/KARIN/

"Under the Sky World' is another story of IF.
If KARIN in the main plot infected with [virus], so on the wrong path of words ......
This is a small story about KARIN "if" -

Game features

  • extra paragraph RPG short story
  • A short RPG content experience
  • Watch the main character's story from a different perspective
developers: サークル☆フェアリーフラワー
